item.title: PoS Validation Protocol Blockscape Stakes Additional 140 ETH, Bringing Total Stake to 627 ETH
item.description: On July 26th, based on the data of Strategic ETH Reserve, the Ethereum PoS validation protocol Blockscape has increased its reserves by approximately 140 ETH, which is worth about $510,000. As a result, the total Ethereum holdings have reached 627 ETH.

item.title: LIBRA Project Advisor Acknowledges LIBRA as a Speculative Meme Coin
item.description: On July 26th, as per Argentine media Clarín, Hayden Davis, an advisor to the LIBRA project, recently submitted a document to a U.S. court. For the first time, he acknowledged that LIBRA is a Meme token and denied that it is an investment project with a business plan. This contradicts the claim made by President Javier Milei that it "supports the Argentine economy."Davis's defense attorney admitted that the Meme token "is not an investment, has no intrinsic value, but is an unsecured and uncollateralized asset with speculative and collectible characteristics, and its market volatility is extremely high." Meanwhile, another fund transaction came to light. On January 30th of this year, during a meeting at the presidential palace with Milei, the wallet associated with Davis transferred nearly 500,000 USDC to the centralized exchange Kraken, suspected to be related to project fund flows. Records also show that the purpose of the meeting held at the presidential palace on January 30th was

item.title: Two Tron addresses holding over 10 million USDT each have been frozen by Tether
item.description: On July 26th, as per the monitoring of Whale Alert, two Tron addresses that were holding more than 10 million USDT were frozen by Tether. One address was holding 12,756,824 USDT, and the other was holding 11,308,430 USDT.

item.title: The Ethena team's associated address recently deposited 150 million ENA to a CEX, worth $77.35 million.
item.description: July 26th. Based on the monitoring of @EmberCN, on July 21st, following Ethena's announcement that StablecoinX would have ENA as a reserve, an address linked to an Ethena team member began to transfer out ENA.A total of 150 million ENA (equivalent to 77.35 million USD) has entered Binance and Bybit within the 5 days since the announcement. The most recent transfer to a trading platform took place 2 hours ago.

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Surges Above $118,000
item.description: On July 26th, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin has rebounded and is now above $118,000, with a 24-hour increase of 1.46%.

item.title: Past 7 days CEX Net outflow of 99,500 ETH
item.description: On July 26th, according to Coinglass data, during the past 7 days, CEX has witnessed a total net outflow of 99,500 Ethereum. The top three exchanges with outflows are as follows:· Binance, with an outflow of 24,200 ETH;· Bitfinex, with an outflow of 23,100 ETH;· Coinbase Pro, with an outflow of 9,387.90 ETH.In addition, OKX saw an inflow of 8,607.98 ETH and ranked first on the inflow list.

item.title: CEX Net Outflow of 17,117.49 BTC in the Last 7 Days
item.description: On July 26th, according to Coinglass data, during the past 7 days, the total net outflow of BTC from CEXs was 17,117.49 BTC. The top three exchanges with the largest outflows are as follows:· Coinbase Pro, with an outflow of 8,701.25 BTC;· Kraken, with an outflow of 5,668.80 BTC;· Binance, with an outflow of 2,635.99 BTC.In addition, Bitfinex saw an inflow of 501.41 BTC and ranked first on the inflow list.

item.title: BiyaPay Analyst: Once Considered Splitting NVIDIA, Now Engaging in Mutual Praise with Jensen Huang, Trump's AI Stance Takes a Subtle Turn
item.description: On July 26th, during an Artificial Intelligence summit held in Washington D.C., U.S. President Trump declared that he had earnestly contemplated breaking up NVIDIA in order to disrupt the company's AI chip monopoly and boost industry competition. Trump recollected, "Before I grasped the facts, I remarked, 'We are going to disassemble this company.'" Nevertheless, after receiving a briefing from his staff, he became aware that NVIDIA had already achieved a prominent advantage in technology and the ecosystem, making it challenging to be replaced in the short run.Ultimately, he conceded, "This is not a simple matter." More significantly, Trump subsequently publicly commended NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang and engaged with him on the spot. Huang responded in kind on the stage, stating, "The unique advantage of the United States is something that other countries do not possess, that is President Trump." The mutual "praise" between the two regarding AI policy implies Trump's pursuit of a more bal

item.title: This month, the buyback of tokens by pump.fun has been severely "halved," with the $19.5 million PUMP now only worth $8.2 million.
item.description: On July 26th, as monitored by OnchainLens, 8 to 10 days ago, pump.fun allocated 120,450 SOL (valued at $19.5 million at that time) to purchase 3.07 billion PUMP tokens. However, currently, the total value of these tokens amounts only to $8.2 million.Related wallet addresses:3vkpy5YHqnqJTnA5doWTpcgKyZiYsaXYzYM9wm8s3WTiG8CcfRffqZWHSAQJXLDfwbAkGE95SddUqVXnTrL4kqjm

item.title: 「LUNA/UST Flash Crash Shorting Whale」 Acquires 80.2623 WBTC at an Average Price of $118,174
item.description: On July 26th, according to on-chain analyst AI Auntie @ai_9684xtpa, the "Whale Who Shorted BTC to Earn $5.16 Million During the LUNA/UST Flash Crash" has once again entered the market, this time focusing on WBTC.In the past half an hour, he spent $9.485 million to purchase 80.2623 WBTC at an average price of $118,174. "The bearish impact of the ancient whale's sell-off has become a reality, and it seems that this smart money is optimistic about the future performance."
